title: Sound On: SCOTUS Blocks Vaccine Mandate
itunes:title: Sound On: SCOTUS Blocks Vaccine Mandate
description:
Guests: Representative Barbara Lee of California, Labor Secretary Marty Walsh, Bloomberg National Political reporter, Mark Niquette and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
